title: Barisal Divisional Stadium
text:
Barisal Divisional Stadium (also known as Abdur Rab Serniabad Stadium) is a <a href="multi-purpose%20stadium">multi-purpose stadium</a> in <a href="Barisal">Barisal</a>, <a href="Bangladesh">Bangladesh</a>. It is currently used mostly for <a href="association%20football">football</a> and <a href="cricket">cricket</a> matches. The stadium holds 30,000 people.
History.
The stadium hosted its first youth international cricket match between <a href="Bangladesh%20national%20under-19%20cricket%20team">Bangladesh U-19</a> and <a href="Sri%20Lanka%20national%20under-19%20cricket%20team">Sri Lanka U-19</a> on 26 October 2019.
